quote: You are enough just as you are.
Every day may not be good, but there is something good in every day.
Your present circumstances don’t determine where you can go; they merely determine where you start.
The struggle you’re in today is developing the strength you need for tomorrow.
Happiness is not the absence of problems, but the ability to deal with them.
You are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think.
Small progress is still progress.
Don’t be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.
You don’t have to control your thoughts; you just have to stop letting them control you.
Do something today that your future self will thank you for.
It’s okay to not be okay, as long as you are not giving up.
Healing takes time, and that’s okay.
No rain, no flowers.
Your mental health is just as important as your physical health.
Breathe. It’s just a bad day, not a bad life.
The darkest nights produce the brightest stars.
Be kind to yourself; you are doing the best you can.
You deserve to rest, just as much as you deserve to work hard.
A little progress each day adds up to big results.
Your potential is endless. Go do what you were created to do.
Self-love is not selfish; you cannot truly love another until you know how to love yourself.
It’s never too late to be what you might have been.
One step at a time. You don’t have to figure everything out at once.
Your past does not define you; your present does.
There is hope, even when your brain tells you there isn’t.
Sometimes, the best thing you can do is not think, not wonder, not imagine, just breathe and have faith.
Your feelings are valid. Don’t let anyone tell you otherwise.
You are not your thoughts. You are the observer of your thoughts.
Be gentle with yourself; you are doing the best you can.
You are growing through what you are going through.
Positivity is a choice. Make it daily.
Trust the process. Everything is unfolding as it should.
Sometimes, the most productive thing you can do is relax.
You are allowed to take up space.
Talk to yourself like someone you love.
You are not alone. You are loved.
Your worth is not measured by your productivity.
Healing isn’t linear, and that’s okay.
You are capable of more than you know.
Surround yourself with people who lift you up.
A positive mindset brings positive things.
Sometimes, the bravest thing you can do is ask for help.
It’s not selfish to put yourself first sometimes.
Even the smallest step forward is still progress.
You have survived 100% of your worst days. Keep going.
Love yourself enough to set boundaries.
You are in charge of how you feel today.
Nothing is permanent. Not even your struggles.
Give yourself permission to rest.
Find joy in the little things.
